title: Windows Repair Pro (All In One) 3.9.5 & Portable + Serial
description:
Windows Repair Pro (All In One) 3.9.5 & Portable + Serial [4realtorrentz]

Windows Repair â€“ tool all-in -one solution to repair the system. Designed to restore various Windows settings to their default values. Helps to fix a wide variety of problems including registry errors and file permissions as well as issues with Internet Explorer, Windows Update, Windows Firewall and more.
Before running the Windows Repair will be asked to perform 4 simple steps warning system malfunction : checking for viruses, check the hard disk , checking for corrupt system files and create a restore point. You can then select one of the three Basic, Advanced and Custom, each of which offers a variety of system repair.

Tweaking.com â€“ Windows Repair is an all-in-one repair tool to help fix a large majority of known Windows problems including:

- Reset File Permissions
- Register System Files
- Repair WMI
- Repair Windows Firewall
- Repair Internet Explorer
- Repair MDAC & MS Jet
- Repair Hosts File
- Remove Policies Set By Infections
- Repair Icons
- Repair Winsock & DNS Cache
- Remove Temp Files
- Repair Proxy Settings
- Unhide Non System Files
- Repair Windows Updates
- Repair CD/DVD Missing/Not Working

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Block all out going connections with firewall
3. Use given details to register
4. Done
